sentences.en: Basically it comes down to whether you hitchhike or go by bus.
sentences.cn: 基本的一点是你搭便车去还是乘公共汽车去?

sentences.en: Don't worry, we'll just hitchhike back.
sentences.cn: 没关系的, 会有车来接我们回去的.

sentences.en: Neff hitchhiked to New York during his Christmas holiday.
sentences.cn: 内夫在圣诞节休假期间搭免费便车去了纽约。

sentences.en: No bother go back to the camp . If you get lost, just hitchhike home.
sentences.cn: 如果你迷路了, 就不用麻烦再回来了,直接拦便车回家吧!

sentences.en: Travel is cheap if you fly, and easy and free if you hitchhike.
sentences.cn: 如果你飞,旅行很廉宜, 和容易和免费如果你搭便车.

sentences.en: Two men hitchhike towards Los Angeles a 1937 photo.
sentences.cn: 1937年,两个想搭便车到洛杉矶的男人.

sentences.en: When money has a tangible value, a lot of emotional things hitchhike on its coattails.
sentences.cn: 金钱具有实实在在的价值, 因此很多有关情感的东西和它搭上了关系.

words.tran_cn: 搭便车的旅行者；顺便插入的广告

trans.tran_en: If you hitchhike, you travel by getting rides from passing vehicles without paying
